title: can i get 10 rp?
body: wana buy skin 10 rp for buying key got 115 rp

replies.body:
Hmmmmmm so you only need 10 RP for that next key? Since it's such a low amount, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We might be able to work something out!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
